title: My Gold Boarder isn't showing up in loading screen
body: I earned gold 5 in the last season and had my boarder. Now when i play a game, my boarder is missing. It's been like that for almost a week now. Any help?

replies.body: I took a look into this for you but it sucks to say this account wasn't eligible for rewards this season.  If you'd like more context, hit up our PB team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  They'll be happy to review your case and address any concerns!
How is that possible though? I earned gold 5. It even says on my profile in game?
What mode did you earn this in and what mode are you playing in?
I earned it in 5v5 and was playing both Poro King and normal draft

Seems like the support got the answer I was thinking of next.

Being ineligible for rewards near the end of the season could be the case for sure. Even if you actually reached that rating they can void the rewards like the loading screen border if you were punished.
